definition: A term used to describe a specific section or division within a written work, typically denoted by a paragraph break. It is commonly employed in various forms of literature, essays, articles, and other written compositions to organize and separate different ideas or topics.

examples.german: Der Absatz des Buches ist sehr hoch.
examples.english: The sales of the book are very high.

examples.german: Die Schuhe haben einen hohen Absatz.
examples.english: The shoes have a high heel.

examples.german: Der Absatz des Artikels ist gestiegen.
examples.english: The sales of the article have increased.

examples.german: Der Absatzmarkt für Elektroautos wächst stetig.
examples.english: The market for electric cars is growing steadily.

examples.german: Der Absatz von Bio-Lebensmitteln nimmt zu.
examples.english: The sales of organic food are increasing.
